snippet: The military’s exclusion of women in combat doesn’t acknowledge the changing reality of warfare and unfairly denies them opportunities for advancement.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the Defense Department for continuing to bar women from direct combat; calls for the discriminatory policy to end.
